posts.post_title: FS:  T206 Raw Low Grade Commons PLUS 1 HOF'er **ALL SOLD****
posts.post_content:
Hello.  I have the following low grade (see scans) T206 cards for sale.  

Please add $4 shipping for 1 to 3 cards.  For 4 or more, shipping is on me.  

Payment via PayPal FF only.  I ship in bubble mailers and try to ship at least twice a week, with all shipments dropped directly at the Post Office.

Please send me a PM with any questions.  

THANKS FOR LOOKING!!!
